fullDescription.intro:
This node decrypts pgp files with a given keyfile and password
Only supports .pgp files
fullDescription.option: Enter a valid location where the encrypted .pgp file is located. The required syntax of a path depends on the chosen file system, such as "C:\path\to\file" (Local File System on Windows) or "/path/to/file" (Local File System on Linux/MacOS and Mountpoint).

Enter a valid location where the decrypted file should be written to. The required syntax of a path depends on the chosen file system, such as "C:\path\to\file" (Local File System on Windows) or "/path/to/file" (Local File System on Linux/MacOS and Mountpoint).

Enter a valid location where the pgp keyfile is located. The required syntax of a path depends on the chosen file system, such as "C:\path\to\file" (Local File System on Windows) or "/path/to/file" (Local File System on Linux/MacOS and Mountpoint).

ports.outPort: Entry credentials as well as all properties of entry
